name: The Palladium Rule
description:
A surreal platfirmer experience.
Please note that the game is currently very broken :[ 

Assets used:
NEKONIN Character Sprites by Pipoya
Starry Space Background by Enjl
Ludum Dare 28 Game Loops by Abstraction
Ruins Tileset by Penusbmic

This is an entry for the Full-Time Game Dev Game Jam (August 2021).
